scripts.CLIENT_ID: echo 'Enter the apps CLIENT_ID and press [ENTER]: ' && read ID && echo 'CLIENT_ID='$ID > .env
scripts.CLIENT_SECRET: echo 'Enter the apps CLIENT_SECRET and press [ENTER]: ' && read ID && echo 'CLIENT_SECRET='$ID >> .env
scripts.setup-dev: npm run CLIENT_ID && npm run CLIENT_SECRET && npm run PORT && npm install
scripts.setup-staging: echo http://$USER-${PWD##*/}-staging.herokuapp.com/oauth | pbcopy && heroku create $USER-${PWD##*/}-staging && open https://api.slack.com/apps/new
